Articles.Content:
So it's already 1.5.1, and so far, the DLC service bay have two technical issue:

  1. even with advanced tweakable, you can always stage its panels
  2. Once you stage it, and then get out of its view, and upon return, the service bay only have the appearance of being popped open. This is especially problematic with the SM-25, as it's designed to have its panel popped open to exposed payloads as needed -- so it become difficult to click on the parts within the two compartments.

Wondering if they will be fixed?
